Introduction to jekyll

27 October 2013

Jekyll is a Ruby script to generate a static HTML website from source text and themes. Unlike Wordpress, Drupal, Tumblr or other services, the HTML is generated before being deployed to the web serverâ€“ not during each web request. Therefore, blogs using Jekyll load extremely fast and can handle high volumes of traffic without hiccups.
